name: Trinidad and Tobago Civil Aviation Authority (TTCAA) â€“ Civil Aviation Training Centre (CATC)
about: The Civil Aviation Training Centre (CATC) of the Trinidad and Tobago Civil Aviation Authority (TTCAA) is a premier aviation training institution in the Caribbean. Established in 1963, CATC provides comprehensive training in air navigation services, aviation safety, and security. Equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, including collapsible classrooms, a computer-based classroom, and advanced simulators, CATC offers realistic training simulations and gate-to-gate interactions. The centre caters to students from across the Caribbean, offering a wide range of courses including air traffic control, aerodrome operations, and human factors. With partnerships with internationally recognized training institutions, CATC continues to pursue excellence in aviation training, ensuring the highest standards of safety and efficiency in the region. CATC is dedicated to developing skilled professionals who contribute to a safe and efficient aviation industry.
services:
["Air Navigation Training
Air Safety Management Training
Aviation Security and Facilitation
ICAO Trainair Plus Programmes
IATA Regional Training Centre Programmes"]
